entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Kinngait
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.4Â°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
